text: Nawaf Massalha (, , 26 November 1943 â€“ 26 October 2021, also spelt Nawaf Mazalha or Nawaf Masalha) was an Israeli politician. He was a member of the Knesset. He became the first Muslim Arab to hold a ministerial position when he became Deputy Minister of Health by Yitzhak Rabin in 1992. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Israeli politicians
title: Nawaf Massalha
